creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: hot water jug, stand and spirit lamp; silver; George III; band of fluting around body; replacement wooden handle
inscription:
Inscriptions; Marks

An unidentified crest is engraved on the front of the jug and on the spirit lamp.
markings:
Crest of marquis (14 balls) with peacock standing on a cap of maintenance; fully marked, underside of jug; maker\'s name, date letter, lion passant, underside of lid


Fully marked on underside of jug.  Maker\'s mark, date letter, lion passant on underside of lid.  Maker\'s mark, date letter, sovereign\'s head, lion passant on side of spirit lamp.  Date letter, lion passant on bezel of lamp cover.  Maker\'s mark, date letter, sovereign\'s head, lion passant on side of stand.  Maker\'s mark on underside of stand.
object_name: Hot water jug with warming stand
title: Hot water jug with warming stand
